name: Starmie
flavorText: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value this core as a gem.

attacks.name: Recover
attacks.text: Discard 1 Water Energy card attached to Starmie in order to use this attack. Remove all damage counters from Starmie.

attacks.name: Star Freeze
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
